hero.title: Planning Poker
hero.subtitle: Planning poker for agile teams working from home. No cards, no login - just create a room and send a link to your colleagues.

quickSimple.title: No Login
quickSimple.description: Create a room in 10 seconds. Send the link to your team. Done. No registration, no signup.

teamCollaboration.title: Emoji Battle
teamCollaboration.description: Throw emojis at your colleagues while discussing stories. Because remote work should be fun too!

realTimeResults.title: See All Votes
realTimeResults.description: Write a short title and description for your story, vote, and see the result instantly.

secureSessions.title: Save Results
secureSessions.description: See how you voted on different stories. Everything gets saved so you can go back and look.

storyManagement.title: Simple Interface
storyManagement.description: No fancy features you don't use. Just what you need for planning poker.

progressTracking.title: Completely Free
progressTracking.description: Nothing to pay, no limitations. Use it as much as you want.

step1.title: Create Room
step1.description: Click the button and write what the room should be called. That's it.

step2.title: Send Link
step2.description: Copy the link and send it to your team in Slack, Teams or wherever you chat.

step3.title: Vote On Stories
step3.description: Write what you're voting on, everyone votes, and you can see the result and save it.

cta.title: Try it now
cta.subtitle: Takes 30 seconds to get started. No login, no hassle, just planning poker that works.
